title: my league wont open (mac)
body: i just got a new computer and its a mac i downloaded new client and it says to launch once i press launch it just closes and nothing happens Ive waited for 2 - 5 minutes after pressing launch and nothing happens please help me

replies.body: It almost sounds like that new Mac may not have the right permissions set up to allow League to launch the way it's supposed to. Run through [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#mq9) really quick and you should be able to get back on the Rift in no time. Hit me back if you're still having problems though!
Hey sorry took so long to reply it is still not working on my Mac and I did all of the things you said deleted league and re downloaded it it's still having the same  problem

I've been tracking this Mac issue for awhile now, and it seems to be mostly older Macs from around 2007 or earlier that are being affected. Porocles and I have a [**sticky posted**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/2aNwwPQY-5232017-older-macs-unable-to-launch-league) regarding these Mac problems, so be sure to check that for updates.
hey i am still having the same problem and the sticky post didn't really help because i didn't know what to do can you please help i am bored as hecky
